Function Documentation

double opt_compute_cost_function ( m3_point &  p,
m3_env *  env 
)

Compute the cost function associated to the point.

The cost function is actually monotonically dependent on the geometric average of the objectives.

Parameters:
env the M3 env
p the point for which the cost function should be computed
Returns:
the value of the cost function.

string &  opt_name 
)

Loads the specified optimizer plug-in within the shell.

Parameters:
env the M3 env
opt_name the name of the optimizer.
Returns:
true if everything went fine when loading the optimizer.

m3_env *  env 
)

Converts the point representation and the associated metrics into a csv string.

Parameters:
env the M3 env
p the point for which the csv representation should be computed
Returns:
the csv representation of the point.
